doc.name: DummyTransformer
doc.description:
Class comments

A DummyTransformer is a simple actor with one input port and one output port imitation a filter type of actor It is used for testing the OptimizingSDFDirector.

See ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.OptimizingSDFDirector, ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.SharedBufferTransformer, ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.OptimizingSDFScheduler and ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.BufferingProfile for more information.
doc.author: Marc Geilen
